snippet: A ban that was to have gone into effect on a videoconferencing system that allows doctors to prescribe abortion pills to women in rural areas was halted by the Iowa Supreme Court.
abstract: Ban that was to have gone into effect on a videoconferencing system that allows doctors to prescribe abortion pills to women in rural areas is halted by Iowa Supreme Court.
lead_paragraph: A ban that was to have gone into effect on a videoconferencing system that allows doctors to prescribe abortion pills to women in rural areas was halted by the Iowa Supreme Court.

headline.main: Iowa: Stay Is Issued for Abortion Restriction
headline.print_headline: Iowa: Stay Is Issued for Abortion Restriction
